name: Facebook Engagement
description: Monitor the number of people who engaged with your page. Originates from the Gallery.

facebook.name: Facebook Engagement
facebook.description: Monitor the number of people who engaged with your page. Engagement includes any click or story created (Unique Users). Originates from the Gallery.

datasourceConfigModel.label: Facebook Page Name
datasourceConfigModel.description: To find your page name, navigate to your company Facebook page. The page name can be found in the address bar between 'facebook.com/' and the question mark. For example, capture 'klipfolio' from 'facebook.com/klipfolio?'.
